description: --- home: true heroText: Xin's Blog tagline: 'The secret of success is constancy of purpose.' # heroImage: /hero.png heroImageStyle: {   maxWidth: '600px',   width: '100%',   display: block,   margin: '9rem auto 2rem',   background: '#fff',   borderRadius: '1rem', } # 背景图片样式 # bgImageStyle: { #   # width: '100vw', #   height: '100vh', # } # bgImage: '/bgImage/bg7.png' isShowTitleInHome: false actionText: Guide actionLink: /views/other/guide features: - title: Yesterday   details: 开发一款看着开心、写着顺手的 vuepress 博客主题 - title: Today   details: 希望帮助更多的人花更多的时间在内容创作上，而不是博客搭建上 - title: Tomorrow   details: 希望更多的爱好者能够参与进来，帮助这个主题更好的成长 ---
